jobDescription: Duties: This role is a data scientist role, requiring to know data, programming of writing queries involved with a new tool. Work closely with project pilot team to apply research/experimental skills to design pilot/data analysis read out of a new analytical project.Ensure the optimal development and implementation of pilot activities/projects are in alignment with program timeline and budgetTracking/supporting operational activities related to the implementation of Pilot activities and other activities/project across the programPrepare agenda, minutes, and/or support development of ppt deliverablesSkills:Strong understanding of how to apply research and experimental skills into project/pilot design and data analysis ability to communicate technical product information in a clear, concise and creative manner * Strong problem solving, Excel modeling, math and statistical skills * Strong organizational, project management, and ppt skills * Exceptional written, verbal, and listening communication skills, and strong interpersonal skills working in a team environment * Ability to successfully achieve results within a multi-cultural and geographically diverse team and a very fast-paced, changing environment * Ability and willingness to work autonomously on various projects simultaneously in cross- functional environment * Knows how to design and run experimental activities/pilots * Strong clinical knowledgeStrong NLP knowledge preferred, Experienced in R, Python, SQL and other programming languageEducation:Advanced degree, PHD preferred Type:Temp/ContractLocation:South San Francisco, CA
